content: pennywise afghan square by diana krenz ___________________________________________________________________________________________________ crochet level intermediate i made my squares with dk yarn and crochet hook size crochet terms us 4 5mm my finished square measures just about 11 with worsted weight yarn and crochet hook size 5 00mm this pattern is available in english only h your finished square should measure about 12 abbreviations magic_ring - magic_ring round - round space - space skip - skip st - stitch slip_stitch - slip_stitch yo - yarn over lp - loop beg - beginning stand - standing chain - chain cluster - cluster single_crochet - single_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet treble_crochet - treble_crochet special stitches beg double_crochet - ch1 single_crochet into magic_ring or st/space ch1 fpsc/treble_crochet - front post single_crochet/treble_crochet insert hook from front to back start with a magic_ring around the post of indicated st bpsc/half_double_crochet/double_crochet - back post single_crochet/half_double_crochet/double_crochet insert hook from round 1 in magic_ring start with a beg double_crochet 11 double_crochet close with invisible back to front around the post of indicated st join 12 double_crochet 2dccl - yo insert hook in indicated space yo and pull up a https //www youtube com/watch v=vovi8duekqw loop yo and pull through 2 loops 2 times yo and pull through last 3 loops round 2 with new color stand bpsc around any double_crochet ch1 bpsc 3dccl - yo insert hook in indicated space yo and pull up a around next double_crochet repeat around ch1 close with a slip_stitch in first loop yo and pull through 2 loops 3 times yo and pull bpsc and cut yarn 12 bpsc 12 ch1 space through last 4 loops 3trcl - yo 2 times insert hook in indicated space yo pull round 3 skip all st work only in chain space up a loop yo pull through 2 loops on hook 2 times with new color stand 3dccl in any chain space ch2 3dccl in next 3 times yo pull through all 4 loops chain space repeat around ch2 close with a slip_stitch in top of first v-st - double_crochet ch1 double_crochet in same space or st 3dccl and cut yarn 12 3dccl 12 ch2 space picot - ch3 slip_stitch in back bump of first chain popcorn - make 5 double_crochet in same st remove hook and insert hook round 4 skip all cluster work only in chain space in top of first double_crochet grab loop and pull through with new color stand 2dccl in any chain space ch2 2dccl in same chain space *ch1 2dccl ch2 2dccl in next chain space* repeat i often use a standing stitch at the beginning of a round from * to * around ch1 close with a slip_stitch in top of first work these stitches as a normal stitch but at the 2dccl and cut yarn 24 2dccl 12 ch2 space 12 ch1 space beginning with a slip knot on your hook to start a round ____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ design by © koernerklaus november 2019 no sale no uploading on social media no
